DishDescription: A winter-warming mushroom soup, served with croutons
Prawn and smoked salmon roulade, toasted ciabatta and served with a mango and cumin drizzle
A generous slice of pressed terrine served with toasted ciabatta, butter and a traditional chutney

Succulent roast turkey, pigs in blankets, sage and sausage meat stuffing, seasonal vegetables, crisp roast potatoes and rich gravy

A soft sponge layered with raspberries and served with crème fraîche ice cream
